title: APC Gym Log System
description: A comprehensive gym management system for APC (Asia Pacific College) that allows students and staff to track gym attendance, workout routines, and fitness progress. Features real-time tracking, admin dashboard, and analytics.

title: APC Honors Checker
description: An automated system for checking student eligibility for academic honors at Asia Pacific College. Calculates GPA, validates honor requirements, and generates honor certificates. Streamlines the academic honors evaluation process.

title: Certificate Generator
description: A powerful certificate generation tool that automates the creation of customized certificates for events, workshops, and competitions. Features template management, bulk generation, and automatic email distribution.

title: School Portal
description: A comprehensive school management portal that integrates student information, grade management, enrollment systems, and parent-teacher communication. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.
